product_name: Benchmark Maps Washington Road and Recreation Atlas - 4th Edition
long_description: Explore the beautiful Evergreen State with the unparalled information and detail of the Washington Road and Recreation Atlas. The award-winning design of these maps includes generous page-to-page overlaps, GPS grids and easy-to-read symbols. Includes the renowned Landscape Maps(TM) in 1:400,000 scale, showcasing beautiful, shaded relief of land topography. Maps show recreation information and road classes, from freeways to off-road trails, for entire state at a scale of 1 in. = 6.2 miles (1:400,000). Recreation Guide includes parks, monuments, historic sites, campgrounds, RV parks and boat launches. Includes "Metro Area Maps" of large cities at 1:125,000 scale to enhance detail and simplify urban navigation. Climate graphs for most cities help you plan when best to visit. Features a comprehensive index for quickly locating attractions and destinations. Maps are field-checked for accuracy and also include regional maps with regional and local mileages and mileage chart. Map details include rest areas. exit numbers, point-to-point roadway mileages, campgrounds, RV parks, road surface type and cities, with elevation. Copyright 2007; Benchmark Maps; 102 pages; softcover.
short_description: Explore the beautiful Evergreen State with the unparalled information and detail of the Washington Road and Recreation Atlas.
